Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) passes at 'A' Level in Biology /Zoology /Botany and any other Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit in Biology and any other Science subject.

(iii) NCE merit in Agriculture (Double Major).
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalents in English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science., Mathematics and another relevant subject.
Subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Religious Studies and one (1) other Arts subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II merit in five (5) subjects including English Language, Religious Studies and three (3) other Arts subjects.
Subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
Subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
Subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, EHA-AMUFU, (AFFLILIATED TO UNN), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) NCE Integrated         Science

 

(ii)   NCE Science

       Education
